page.title: 05NEW WARDOUR CASTLE
page.content: {Wardour New Castle}was built by the {Arundell}family. It is one of the {Grade 1}listed buildings. It is famous for its magnificent{Rotunda.}The Castle was sold in{1960}to be the new {Cranborne Chase School}which was founded in{Crichel House}in{1946.}When the school moved it kept its name. There are{139 girls}at the school, nearly all of them{boarders.}Most of them are{British,}several being{Scots. There are about 8 girls from{Nigeria. One girl comes from{Peking}and 2 from {America.}The all girls' school is divided into{4 houses.}These compete in{games}and{athletics.}The school is famous for{Art}and{Music.}The{Catholic girls go to Mass at{Wardour Chapel, but the rest of them go to a small chapel in the school which is served by an{Anglican minister}from{Tisbury. {Susannah Catherine Claire
